product.name: Serum
product.protip: Always apply before moisturizer to allow for maximum absorption

product.name: Instant Wrinkle-Smoother
product.Quantity: A thin layer on areas like crow's feet and forehead lines
product.protip: For best results,use this after serum,but before moisturizer and makeup

product.name: Face Moisturizer with SPF-30
product.Quantity: A quarter size amount-about a teaspoon
product.protip: If you're also applying it to your chest and neck,you'll need about a tablespoon

product.name: Dark Spot-Fading Serum
product.Quantity: A pea-size amount ,applied all over your face
product.protip: If it contains retinol,don't use a retinol cream or moisturizer over it

product.name: Eye Cream
product.Quantity: A pea-size amount all around the eye
product.protip: If using it in the morning interferes with your makeup,use it only at night

product.name: Night Cream
product.Quantity: A pea-size amount,if it has retinol;if not,dime-size
product.protip: Allow it to be absorbed into skin for a few minutes before bedtime so it won't come off on your pillowcase

product.name: Anti-Aging Lip Treatment
product.protip: Best to use pre-bedtime,since it's better absorbed while you sleep. Can also be used during the day

product.name: At-Home Peel
product.protip: If you're using a retinol night or day cream,skip it the day before,the day of,and the day after a peel

product.name: Body Lotion
product.protip: Slather on after toweling off post-shower to help lock in moisture
